statements: UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET detected_faces = 5 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET face_identification_result = '{"confidence": 0.95, "name": "John Doe"}' WHERE id = '87654321-12ab-34cd-56ef-098765432112';

UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg', detected_faces = 5, face_identification_result = '{"confidence": 0.89, "matched": true}' WHERE id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4b31';

UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET detected_faces = 10, face_identification_result = '{"confidence": 0.75, "matched": false}', image_url = 'https://example.com/image2.jpg' WHERE id = '3d813cbb-47fb-41d1-a193-55b2a4a2ba6b';
UPDATE facial_recognition_users SET username = 'alice_smith', full_name = 'Alice Smith' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE facial_recognition_logs SET action = 'Login Success' WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE facial_recognition_users SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE facial_recognition_logs SET timestamp = '2022-01-18 15:30:00+00', action = 'Login Successful' WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE FaceRecognitionUsers SET password = 'new_password' WHERE user_id = '844c4e2e-46c9-4a92-8e1b-a447540f0a32';
UPDATE FaceRecognitionData SET image_url = 'https://example.com/new_image.jpg', data_type = 'profile' WHERE data_id = '09af28ff-1071-468f-b2cc-6375ac415aae';
UPDATE FaceRecognitionUsers SET password='new_password123' WHERE username='john_doe';
UPDATE FaceRecognitionData SET image_url='https://example.com/image.jpg' WHERE data_type='profile' AND user_id='a6eab10e-1f7b-4a7f-b8a6-2eceb5f68958';
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id='5f8a58d2-91be-46ab-ae25-b4e216f8f042';
UPDATE user_faces SET face_data=E'\\xDEADBEEF' WHERE face_id='4aa1a5e0-486e-4fef-a7b1-2ce976487e5a';
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_faces SET face_data = E'\\\xDEADBEEF' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE User SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Log SET action_description = 'User logged out' WHERE log_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE User SET email = 'newemail@example.com', password = 'newpassword' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE Image SET timestamp = NOW(), user_id = 'fd6558c2-89cf-4f9e-9831-59971b72e31d' WHERE image_id = '30a83272-b3ff-4fe9-a6b0-8d5969baec15';
